snippet: The bill would authorize the Department of Veterans Affairs to cover the cost of in vitro fertilization treatment for veterans and spouses.
abstract: Senate Committee on Veterans Affairs approves legislation that would expand access to infertility treatment, specifically in vitro fertilization, for disabled veterans.
lead_paragraph: The bill would authorize the Department of Veterans Affairs to cover the cost of in vitro fertilization treatment for veterans and spouses.

headline.main: Panel Approves Veterans’ Infertility Treatment Bill
headline.print_headline: Panel Approves Veterans’ Infertility Treatment Bill
